duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform duties in support of the management of patient folder workflow, resolving unbilled accounts, routine data entry, and retrieving medical records.
Facilitate the retrieval and printing of medical records, as well as the storage, archival, and record retention of documents.
Assist with physician system use-related questions, setting up review queues, and providing training.
Resolve accounts assigned to various work queues which require research and analysis to determine appropriate actions.
Process birth certificates as required by state law, answering phones, and processing incoming mail.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent preferred. Completion of a certification program may be required for Birth Certificate processing; training will be provided.
